name: exactly.ai
title: exactly.ai
payoff: Bespoke AI models for your brand
shortDescription: exactly.ai offers a platform for creating brand-ready visuals using AI-driven style transfer and image generation. It caters primarily to agencies, brands, and artists seeking to maintain style consistency, secure privacy, and own full rights to their creations. An example use case is an art director training models to develop a unique AI style for advertising campaigns.
pros: Own full rights to any image
cons: May require technical knowledge to train models
Potential high cost for custom solutions

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Canva
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Offers easy-to-use design tools with templates

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Adobe Spark
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Provides professional templates and design options

aiSuggestedAlternatives.name: Crello
aiSuggestedAlternatives.reason: Similar features with a focus on animation and graphics
